name: Main Halls
description: The main entrance to the Edge Hill campus, the main building is also an accommodation option which recently had a refurbishment in 2022.

name: Founders East
description: Founders East and West consist of 12 overall buildings. They are both right beside the arts centre and close to the education lake.

name: Founders West
description: Founders East and West consist of 12 overall buildings. They are both right beside the arts centre and close to the education lake.

name: Graduates Court
description: Graduates Court consists of 5 buildings which are close to the education/ health, social care and medicine buildings.

name: Woodland Court
description: Woodland Court consists of 25 buildings, it is specifically only available for second and third years.

name: Chancellors Court
description: Chancellors Court and South consist of 14 buildings close to Edge Hill sport and the creative edge.

name: Chancellors South
description: Chancellors Court and South consist of 14 buildings close to Edge Hill sport and the creative edge.

name: Palatine Court
description: Palatine Court consists of 7 buildings near the main building at the front of the campus.

name: Forest Court
description: Forest Court consists of 10 overall buildings. 4 of these are en-suite and 6 of these are shared bathroom.
